summary: A look at the history of the American comedy publication and production company, National Lampoon, from its beginning in the 1970s to 2010, featuring rare and never-before-seen footage.
cast: Danny Abelson|Judd Apatow|Kevin Bacon|Henry Beard|Anne Beatts|John Belushi|Judith Belushi-Pisano|Richard Belzer|Ed Bluestone|Christopher Buckley|John Candy|Christopher Cerf|Chevy Chase|Michel Choquette|George Coe|Beverly D'Angelo|Sean Daniel|Shary Flenniken|John Goodman|Michael C. Gross|Sam Gross|Christopher Guest|Fred Gwynne|Tony Hendra|Janis Hirsch|Robert Hoffman|John Hughes|Al Jean|Sean Kelly|Douglas Kenney|Peter Kleinman|John Landis|John Lennon|Bill Lippe|Tim Matheson|Bruce McCall|Brian McConnachie|Marshall McLuhan|Meat Loaf|Rick Meyerowitz|Chris Miller|Tom Mott|Bill Murray|Michael O'Donoghue|P.J. O'Rourke|George Plimpton|Gilda Radner|Harold Ramis|Mike Reiss|Ivan Reitman|Matty Simmons|Michael Simmons|Bill Skurski|Martha Smith|Ed Subitzky|Michael Sullivan|Betsy Talbot Blackwell|Ned Tanen|Jerry Taylor|Billy Bob Thornton|John Updike|John Weidman|Ellis Weiner|Stevie Wonder|Richard Nixon|Yoko Ono
title: Drunk Stoned Brilliant Dead: The Story of the National Lampoon
